## Posit Cola - The Project

::: {.callout-caution icon="false"}
## The Question

Can we predict sales revenue for Posit Cola products?
:::

::: {.callout-tip icon="false"}
## Our Approach

We'll use (synthetic) Posit Cola sales data to make predictions about future sales revenue.
:::

![](slide_resources/posit-cola.png){fig-align="center" width="800"}

## ü•§ Project Data

This workshop will use historical data of Posit Cola sales: `ds-workflows-r/data/posit_cola_sales_data.csv`

**Columns:**

::: smaller
-   `date`: Date of sale
-   `product`: Product type (e.g., Classic, Lite, Zero)
-   `region`: Region of sale (e.g., Latin America, North America, Europe)
-   `store_type`: Type of store (e.g., Supermarket, Convenience Store)
-   `store_id`: Unique identifier for the store
-   `units_sold`: Number of units sold
-   `unit_price`: Price per unit
-   `revenue`: Total revenue from sales (units_sold * unit_price)
-   `promotion`: Name of promotion that was running at time of sale
:::

## Project Objective

-   Provide Posit Cola decision makers with a tool to help predict future sales revenue.

<h2><br>Project Requirements</h2>

-   ü§ñ Automate the pipeline
-   ‚ö†Ô∏è Receive alerts if there are issues in the pipeline
-   üîÑ Project is easy to maintain and iterate upon
-   {{< bi share color=#2D8400 >}} Work is reusable by other teams, even if they don't use R (Lookin' at you ![](https://s3.dualstack.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/pythondotorg-assets/media/community/logos/python-logo-only.png){height="50" style="vertical-align:middle"})
